name: CSOX
description: A ReactJS application with Theia and Material UI, designed to optimize performance and enhance functionality. The application utilizes AGGrid and Testing for improved user experience, and features automated deployment processes with CI/CD pipelines on GitLab.

Automated deployment processes with CI/CD pipelines on GitLab, resulting in efficient and error-free releases.
responsibilities: Developed and enhanced various modules within the application.
